DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional field study will investigate rivaroxaban under clinical practice conditions for stroke prevention and for prevention of non-CNS systemic embolism in patients with non-valvular atrial fibrillation in China.
DOC.brief_title: Xarelto on Prevention of Stroke and Non-central Nervous System Systemic Embolism in Patients With Non-valvular Atrial Fibrillation in China: A Non-interventional Study
